titleStmt.title: The complaint of a sinner, vexed with paine, desyring the ioye, that euer shall remayne After W.E. moralized.
titleStmt.author: Birch, William, fl. 1562-1571.
Elderton, William, d. 1592?

publicationStmt.publisher: By Alexander Lacy, for Richard Applow, dwellyng in Pater noster row, hard by the Castle Tauerne,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "The God of loue, that sits aboue,".
A moralization of William Elderton's "God of love".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
